results.title: Live Laugh Love, Load Aim Fire, Wood Décor, Wooden Sign, Rustic Gift, American Flag, Wall Art, Funny Gift for Him, Man Cave Décor, 2A Gift
results.description:
Wooden Sign Decor
A humorous take on Live, Laugh, Love

Live, Laugh, Love
and if that doesn't work
Load, Aim, Fire.

It shows an American Flag made from different styles of long guns.

Perfect for a man cave or for anyone who enjoys shooting sports.

The sample sign is shown in lightly distressed black paint with white lettering and graphic.

• CUSTOM:
Signs are made to order.
There are many options for the base color and image color.
If you would like to request a change in color, please make a note in the personalization.

• SIZE:
This sign is 5.5 inches tall x 12 inches wide and 1/2 inch thick.
This sign will come ready to hand with a sawtooth hanger.
At 1/2 thick, the sign can stand on a mantle or shelf also.
Please message us for a quotation if you prefer a larger or smaller sign size.

• MADE ESPECIALLY FOR YOU:
All signs are made to order, allowing customization and/or personalization requests.
Signs are made using pine or poplar wood (unless otherwise noted in the description).
All wood-based pieces are hand-stained or hand-painted and then sealed with 2-3 coats of polyurethane.
Please note that each piece of wood is hand-selected for its unique grain, knots, and natural "imperfections" which add to the character, beauty, and uniqueness of each piece. All wood measurements are typically within 1/4".

• PROCESSING TIME:
Our typical processing time for made-to-order items is 7 business days or less. Seasonally this time may increase, and that will be reflected in the shipping estimate provided when an order is placed.

• SPECIFIC DELIVERY REQUESTS:
If you have a short timeline for delivery, please reach out and let us know so we can work together to ensure your deadline can be met. Very often, we can accommodate rush order requests, within the limitations of production times.

• SHIPPING:
By default, items are shipped via USPS. Based on weight items may go first-class or priority mail. All items that typically ship first class will offer an upgrade option to priority mail. If you prefer an alternate shipping service (UPS/FEDEX), please reach out to us for a shipping quotation for the alternate service.

• YOU MIGHT ALSO BE INTERESTED IN THE FOLLOWING ITEM(S) IN OUR SHOP:

A Morale Patch Solo Cup Holder

https://www.etsy.com/FlockamingoDesigns/listing/835028816

A Custom Solo Holder Can Depict Any Text/Image You Would Like

https://www.etsy.com/FlockamingoDesigns/listing/880600092


• Check Out Other Products Offered:

https://www.etsy.com/shop/flockamingodesigns

Favorite our shop to make sure you are notified when new items are added.

Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Pinterest to make sure you receive new product information and notices on all new promotions. @flockamingodesigns

If you like the general style but don't see exactly what you are looking for? We would be happy to make a custom order. Contact us and together we will create the perfect piece!

Photo Watermarks Will Not Appear on Final Product.

results.title: Live Laugh Love, Men's / Unisex Black T-Shirt
results.description:
What's more metal than to live, laugh and love? This playful tee will have people doing double takes and maybe even head banging. Based on classic black metal logos, why make a light statement in the most black and heavy way possible?

It is printed on Los Angeles Apparel FF01, 50-50 Poly-Blend T-shirts, sizes Small through XX-Large. Poly-Blend T-shirts are 50% Cotton / 50% Polyester construction. They are very soft and very durable.

The design is created and the screen print is hand-pulled in Vancouver B.C. with only the best quality inks and garments.

Please refer to the size chart for measurements. Model is 5' 11" and wearing a Large.

Note: As items are hand-printed they may vary slightly than pictured.

♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥

What is sterling silver?
Sterling silver is an alloy of silver, which consists of 92.5 percent silver and 7.5 percent copper.

Why does silver tarnish?
Tarnish is a dulling which naturally occurs when silver reacts with sulfur or hydrogen sulfide in the air. Most people think silver tarnishes due to oxidation. But, chemically speaking, silver is not very reactive—it does not react with oxygen or water at normal temperatures. However, other metals in the alloy, usually copper, may react with oxygen in the air.

How do you care for silver jewelry?
Care should be taken to avoid exposing your silver to household chemicals when cleaning with bleach or ammonia, or when swimming in chlorinated water, as these chemicals can damage silver.

How to clean silver jewelry?

The best way to keep your silver jewelry clean is by wearing it often. However, humidity and storing the silver can tarnish the piece, also known as oxidation, which will give the silver a darkish black color. Tarnish is most easily removed when it first becomes visible.

You can use a liquid silver cleaner or polishing cloth that you can purchase at a jewelry store or a Walmart or Target.

Give a stylish twist to your home or office with this printable artwork: an easy, quick and affordable way to decorate any room!
You can easily print at home, take to your local print shop or upload to online printing services.

⤐ DETAILS ⬷
• Digital files immediately available to download on Etsy upon purchase
• High resolution scalable 300 dpi JPG files
• 4 ratio files to print up to 24 proportional sizes: 4’’ x 5’’ - 4’’ x 6’’ - 5’’ x 7’’ - 6’’ x 8’’ - 6’’ x 9’’ - 8’’ x 10’’ - 8 x 12’’ - 9’’ x 12’’ - 10’’ x 15’’ - 11‘’ x 14‘’ - 12’’ x 16’’ - 12’’ x 18’’ - 16’’ x 20’’ - 16’’ x 24’’ - 18’’ x 24’’ - 20’’ x 30’’ - 24’’ x 36’’ - 50 x 70 cm - 60 x 90 cm - A5 - A4 - A3 - A2 - A1

results.title: Live Laugh Love Wall Art Quote - 3 sizes - Wall decor decals home custom fun statement gift DIY
results.description:
Wall Art
“Personalised”
 
You will receive
ONE wall art “personalised” kit
 
“Live Laugh Love” 
 
In the colour of your choice, ready to apply
With a self adhesive peel off backing
Will adhere to most clean, smooth, flat surfaces
Fitting instructions supplied
 
Please note: you will receive the words only, the background colour is purely for illustration purposes and represents your wall colour.  
 
Choose Style Font - wording text - Style A, or Style B 
 
Choose your colour from the drop down menu. 
  
Layout:  The “quote” will be supplied in lines of text; this enables an easier fit for you and gives you the flexibility to adjust the placement of the text to enable your own layout to suit your wall/room. 
You don't have to have it exactly like the advert picture.
 
Sizes:
We can go smaller or larger just ask (prices will vary accordingly)
All sizes width (w) and depth (d) are approximate

Small: 150 mm x 140 mm OR 15 cm x 14.5 cm  
Medium: 200 mm x 190 mm OR 20 cm  x 19 cm  
Large: 300 mm x 280 mm OR 30 cm x 28 cm
To order similar dimensions as shown in our advert image, please ask for a custom order.
Price £ will increase and depend on the final size you require.
 
 
All our wall art and decals are custom made to order and are therefore non-returnable. Please make sure you are happy with your colour and size choice at the time of placing your order. Any questions or problems please contact us and we will assist.  
If your WALL ART quote is to go on a glass door or glass window (on the inside) to be read from the outside – please ask for reverse cut.
 
At Pegasus Signs we can professionally design, manufacture and personalise for you, from our extensive library of graphic images and fonts.
 
We pride ourselves on quality products and service, nothing else will do.
We do not print onto white vinyl we only use self coloured vinyl.
 
PICTURE/IMAGE:
All graphics, photos, illustrations and text are copyright © Pegasus Signs
All rights reserved.
Designated trademarks and brands are the property of their respective owners.
 
Please remember that the actual colours may vary slightly as we’re not professional photographers. Colours also vary from monitor to monitor and are therefore intended as a guide only.
 


SHIPPING/P&P:   
 
We post/ship via Royal mail.

We always use a signed for service.
Please ensure your delivery address is correct and that someone will be able to sign for the delivery.
UK Orders are posted 2nd Class Recorded.
Overseas orders are shipped by International tracked/Signed for. 
 
We aim for you to receive an order the way we would expect to receive an order. All items are practically packaged to ensure safe and secure delivery
 
We always combine postage costs on multiple purchases.
Sometimes it’s difficult to estimate the actual shipping cost.  So if for any reason you have overpaid on postage/shipping we will ensure you receive a part postage refund. We do not make a profit on postage/shipping costs.
 
Postage/shipping costs vary considerably - weight and size are the main factors for increasing the cost.
 
If you do not see an international shipping cost on our advert – please ask us – Thank you.
 

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS
IMPORTANT PLEASE READ

All international buyers are responsible for all taxes, duties and customs fees imposed/charged by the government of your country.

This means: you are responsible for the payment of any duties, taxes or custom fees charged by your government on any goods bought by you from us. 

If you are unsure of the customs rules and charges for your country; we suggest you find out before buying an item. Try searching for customs and excise in your own country online. 

Thank you for reading this important information.

 

Payment:
 
We prefer paypal, it’s safer for everyone
 
 
Items personally designed and manufactured to your specific requirements are non-refundable.
 
However, if we at Pegasus Signs have made an error then a replacement will be sent.
 
 
Thank you
